lyrics.EngStr: The TV keeps flashing
I haven’t even deleted the contact details
The kindness you showed me
But I destroyed it with a wrong move
We once thought
Of having a place to sleep and eat

lyrics.ChnStr: 可怎麼去熬日夜顛倒連頭款也湊不到
lyrics.Pinyin: 可[kě]怎[zěn]麼[mó]去[qù]熬[āo]日[rì]夜[yè]顛[diān]倒[dǎo]連[lián]頭[tóu]款[kuǎn]也[yě]湊[còu]不[bù]到[dào]
lyrics.EngStr: But how could we survive with reversed days and nights, unable to even scrape together the down payment

lyrics.ChnStr: 牆板 被我砸爛 到現在還沒修
lyrics.Pinyin: 牆[qiáng]板[bǎn] 被[bèi]我[wǒ]砸[zá]爛[làn] 到[dào]現[xiàn]在[zài]還[huán]沒[méi]修[xiū]
lyrics.EngStr: The wall panel I smashed is still not repaired

lyrics.ChnStr: 一碗熱的粥 你怕我沒夠 都留一半帶走
lyrics.Pinyin: 一[yī]碗[wǎn]熱[rè]的[de]粥[zhōu] 你[nǐ]怕[pà]我[wǒ]沒[méi]夠[gòu] 都[dū]留[liú]一[yī]半[bàn]帶[dài]走[zǒu]
lyrics.EngStr: A bowl of hot porridge, you feared I wouldn’t have enough, so you left half for me

lyrics.ChnStr: 給你形容 美好今後你常常眼睛會紅
lyrics.Pinyin: 給[gěi]你[nǐ]形[xíng]容[róng] 美[měi]好[hǎo]今[jīn]後[hòu]你[nǐ]常[cháng]常[cháng]眼[yǎn]睛[jīng]會[huì]紅[hóng]
lyrics.EngStr: Describing a beautiful future, you will often have red eyes

lyrics.ChnStr: 原來心疼我 我那時候不懂
lyrics.Pinyin: 原[yuán]來[lái]心[xīn]疼[téng]我[wǒ] 我[wǒ]那[nà]時[shí]候[hòu]不[bù]懂[dǒng]
lyrics.EngStr: I didn’t realize that you cared for me back then

lyrics.ChnStr: 假如我年少有為不自卑
lyrics.EngStr: If I were accomplished when I was young, not insecure
Understanding what is truly precious
Those beautiful dreams

lyrics.ChnStr: 沒給你 我一生有愧
lyrics.Pinyin: 沒[méi]給[gěi]你[nǐ] 我[wǒ]一[yī]生[shēng]有[yǒu]愧[kuì]
lyrics.EngStr: I didn’t give them to you, I feel guilty for my whole life

lyrics.ChnStr: 假如我年少有為 知進退
lyrics.Pinyin: 假[jiǎ]如[rú]我[wǒ]年[nián]少[shǎo]有[yǒu]為[wéi] 知[zhī]進[jìn]退[tuì]
lyrics.EngStr: If I had been accomplished when young, knowing when to advance and retreat
I wouldn’t have made you suffer for me
At the wedding, drink a few more glasses
With the person you are with now
We once thought
Of having a place to sleep and eat

Understanding what is truly precious
Those beautiful dreams

lyrics.Pinyin: 沒[méi]給[gěi]你[nǐ] 我[wǒ]一[yī]生[shēng]有[yǒu]愧[kuì]

lyrics.Pinyin: 假[jiǎ]如[rú]我[wǒ]年[nián]少[shǎo]有[yǒu]為[wéi] 知[zhī]進[jìn]退[tuì]
lyrics.EngStr: If I had been accomplished when young, knowing when to advance and retreat
I wouldn’t have made you suffer for me
At the wedding, drink a few more glasses
With the person you are with now

lyrics.ChnStr: 假如我年少有為不自卑
lyrics.EngStr: If I were accomplished when I was young, not insecure
Tasting the flavor of regret
Money and status
I fought for it but now I wish I could go back

lyrics.ChnStr: 假如我年少有為 知進退
lyrics.Pinyin: 假[jiǎ]如[rú]我[wǒ]年[nián]少[shǎo]有[yǒu]為[wéi] 知[zhī]進[jìn]退[tuì]
lyrics.EngStr: If I had been accomplished when young, knowing when to advance and retreat
I wouldn’t have made you suffer for me
At the wedding, drink a few more glasses
With the person you are with now

lyrics.ChnStr: 在婚禮上 多喝幾杯
lyrics.Pinyin: 在[zài]婚[hūn]禮[lǐ]上[shàng] 多[duō]喝[hē]幾[jī]杯[bēi]
lyrics.EngStr: At the wedding, drink a few more glasses
Wish me to be accomplished when I was young
